function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Varied spatial and temporal distribution of indoor environmental parameters , air speed, air pollution concentrations increase the complexity of accurate ieq monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presumed linearity in relationships between ieq factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Completely ignoring interaction effects in ieq models","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardised measurement protocols for ieq","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Problems around the opportunity costs of occupants spending 30 to 60 minutes filling in a questionnaire.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Confounding factors such as industrial relations climate, staff morale, and personal issues influencing how occupants rate their workplace environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for complex multi-modal interactions that impact occupants in actual office buildings when assessing environmental conditions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependent variables like cognitive performance impacting scientific evidence","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized poe protocol for occupant surveys","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aggressive pursuit of certification from ieq accreditation schemes leading to performance-focused decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance of building operators to relax control may hinder the implementation of measures to mitigate contagious diseases propagation in the built environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tardy adoption of new technologies and slow uptake in the buildings sector may result in inadequate measures to address contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited control of tenants over indoor environmental quality may lead to suboptimal conditions for mitigating contagious diseases propagation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Subjective evaluations of indoor environments by occupants may not align with objective measures, leading to discrepancies in assessing indoor environmental quality.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Narrow control clauses in commercial office tenancy agreements may lead to suboptimal indoor temperature management, potentially impacting occupant comfort and energy efficiency.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High energy expenditure during the operational phase of buildings and non-compliance with energy efficiency standards can lead to significant environmental and climate impacts.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid growth of technology industry leading to increased data mining and analytics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Democratization of analytics for non-experts through easy-to-use web tools and dashboards","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on big data leading to prioritization of data-driven research over traditional scientific method","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Growth of iot and wsn implementation without harmonization of noninteroperable technologies and protocols.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in managing big data from wireless sensor networks, characterized by volume, velocity, and variety.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry-driven development of business intelligence and analytics bia tools without significant academic input.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dense distribution of sensing devices increases the risk of pathogen spread in case of contamination.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wireless transmission of data between nodes may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases if nodes are contaminated.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Largescale deployment of wsn without proper security measures may lead to unauthorized access and potential malicious interference, including spreading malware or viruses.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proliferation of network-addressable devices embedded in everyday objects","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Number of connected devices to reach over 20 billion ’things’ by 2020","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Placement of wireless sensing devices nodes in and around the phenomena of interest","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of off-the-shelf transducers may lead to inaccuracies in data collection for thermal comfort field studies.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited scale and scope of proof-of-concept or project-specific ieq monitoring systems may hinder their widespread implementation in built environments.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift in technological context to low-cost hardware and open-source software may introduce cybersecurity vulnerabilities in ieq monitoring systems.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient ieq monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate measurement of indoor environmental quality ieq","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of outdated comfort assessment systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate health policymaking in china and elsewhere","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on curbing climate change","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of concern for the health of the environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between air pollution and human illness","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extended survival of bioaerosols due to pms and no2","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher mortality rates in provinces with worst air pollution","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Technical and methodological differences between ground-stations and satellite observations could lead to discordance in correlation analyses, impacting the interpretation of air pollution levels.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven spatial coverage and limited spatial coverage of traditional ground stations may lead to incomplete representation of pollution levels experienced by populations in their proximity.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited information about covariables such as health services, epidemiological traits, and population movement hinders the assessment of the relative importance of air pollution among socio-environmental driving factors of covid-19 infections.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air pollutants serving as airborne vectors for virus transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive correlation between respiratory illness and chronic exposure to air pollutants","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of virus fragments in particulate matter","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Association between covid-19 and chronic exposure to air pollution","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High levels of air pollutants such as formaldehyde, carbon monoxide, and particulate matter pm 2.5 are associated with increased covid-19 infections and fatalities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative correlation between aerosol data from satellites and covid-19 fatalities, but positive correlation with infections.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contrary to other pollutants, higher levels of o3 and so2 from satellite and ground data were not associated with more covid-19 deaths and mortality rates.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
